nodes.text: Boss Zraska was a female Gormak living on Voss during the Cold War. She was killed around 3640 BBY.

Zraska appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Voss. She is not directly involved in any quests, however she can be killed by characters of both factions for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means she was killed.
